meanings.definition: Work from home using a computer or telephone.
meanings.sent1: She telecommuted to finish her work from the comfort of her living room.
meanings.sent2: He telecommuted every Friday to avoid the rush hour traffic.
meanings.sent3: The cat telecommuted by lounging on the keyboard, pretending to be busy.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts telecommuted back to the peaceful days of childhood as he typed away.
meanings.sent5: The idea of telecommuting sparked a revolution in the way people viewed work.

meanings.sent1: They telecommuted regularly to stay connected with their team.
meanings.sent2: She telecommuted during the pandemic to stay safe and productive.
meanings.sent3: The robot telecommuted flawlessly, never needing a coffee break.
meanings.sent4: His mind telecommuted to a virtual office where creativity knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The concept of telecommuting opened up a world of possibilities for many workers.
